item.title: Golden Globes change rule about comedies
item.description: Remember the controversy when "The Martian" beat out "Trainwreck" and "Spy" in the best motion picture, musical or comedy category at this year's Golden Globes?
item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
Golden Globes change disputed rule about comedies Updated 2054 GMT (0454 HKT) April 19, 2016 25 photos: Golden Globes 2016: The winners Best motion picture -- drama: "The Revenant" Hide Caption 25 photos: Golden Globes 2016: The winners Best motion picture -- musical or comedy: "The Martian" Hide Caption 25 photos: Golden Globes 2016: The winners Best actor in a motion picture -- drama:
